thread.section_title: Starhotels Metropole - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: very nice hotel
thread.title_full: very nice hotel - Review of Starhotels Metropole, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ddf1959
title: very nice hotel
text:
This was our first time in Rome and I didn't know what to expect for hotels. I was looking for hotels near the train station so we didn't have to drag our luggage on buses or the metro. Finding this hotel was kind of a crap shot considering all the hotels around Termini Station, but it turned out to be a very fortunate choice.
The rooms were spacious and clean. the staff was helpful and the breakfast was well worth the extra money And it was only a couple of streets away from the station.
The only negative was that the street was a little noisy at night.
Room Tip: ask for a room away from the street See more room tips
